Text.Value: I feel it too... draining me dry...
I can barely think straight... this place saps the very thoughts from your mind.
I feel it too. My very essence... draining away.
The shadows will not consume me - I am shielded by Lady Shar.
Same here. I feel... cold.
Me too. So cold.
I feel it also. Energy fading... I won't last long here.
I feel it too. Losing energy... losing focus...

EditorData.NodeContext: Affected by the shadow curse, which is draining their strength

Text.Value: It affects me just fine. I need some light...
They feed on me instead... I need light...
Chk. And I'm losing strength with every step through the dark.
Well - I've got to dispel these shadows, before I fall to this damned curse.
Speak for yourself. I feel awful.
I do not share in your fortune - the shadows hunt me. I need a torch.
I'm not so lucky. Got to dispel these shadows... somehow...

EditorData.NodeContext: Affected by the shadow curse, which is draining their strength

Text.Value: The shadows are hungry - and Shar won't help me now.
The shadows are draining me - I can't just walk through them like before.
These shadows can pull the life from someone - but not me.
The shadows are hungry - and Shar won't help me now.
The dark feels hungry - like it'd drain you dry.
The shadows... feels like they're gnawing at my very being.
I feel... cold. Miserable. What kind of dark is this?
This darkness - it's cursed. I can feel it leeching the life from me.
Dark. Cold. As if all the life is being sucked out of me.
The shadows - I can feel them draining the life from me.
Something's wrong. I feel weak. Drained.
This curse... I need some light...
Tsk'va - I barely have the strength to move forward.
I can't linger in this darkness - I'm weakening by the moment.
I'm fading. Bloody curse - I won't let it take me.
Don't know how much longer I'll last in this darkness.
The curse will consume me entirely if I linger much longer.
My life's bleeding away. This curse, it's - it's too much.
The shadows are hungry here. Doesn't seem to affect me though...
The darkness is encroaching. Can't linger here - not like before.
Anything to keep those shadows at bay.
Yes, light. Before we are consumed entirely.
Light - yes. Something to make the shadows retreat.
Yes - light. Something to cast off the cursed shadows.
Yes, you need some light. Keep whatever you find. I'm... unaffected, so far.
Light's a good idea. Might protect us against this darkness.
A torch, campfire, candle - anything to force the shadows to retreat.
Light, yes. Something to burn the cursed shadows away.

EditorData.NodeContext: Affected by the shadow curse, which is draining their strength

Text.Value: I just need some light... just need to be free of this dark...
Please... some light... dispel the darkness...
Tsk'va - I barely have the strength to move forward...
Please - out of the dark, before it claims me...
I'm running out of steam here. I need to get out of these shadows, or find some light.
The shadow curse claws at me. Need some light.
Please - I can't go much further. Light up the darkness...

EditorData.NodeContext: Affected by the shadow curse, which is draining their strength

Text.Value: The curse is feeding on me - Shar's withdrawn her protection.
These cursed shadows. I can see your strength wilting by the moment.
Urgh, this darkness is gnawing at me.
This darkness - it's too much. I won't last long like this.
Agh... I'll be sucked dry of all life if I linger here...
Ngh. This bloody darkness is sapping the life right out of me.
This isn't right. I feel like absolute shit in this darkness.
The darkness is hungry here. I can feel them sapping my strength.
My energy's draining. The darkness is taking its toll.
The darkness is encroaching. Can't linger here - not like before.
I've never felt so drained...
Not sure... how much farther I can go...
My breath is... ragged. We mustn't fall to the curse...
I - I can't go on much longer.
The shadows are sparing me - but we need to get you some help.
I... I won't last much longer.
I cannot... cannot continue much longer.
Can't... can't continue like this...

EditorData.NodeContext: Affected by the shadow curse, which is draining their strength

Text.Value: We just need some light... banish this darkness...
We need to escape these shadows, while we still have the strength.
We must chase the darkness away, or we are lost.
The darkness will take our very life force, as long as we're in it.
I'm not affected... curious.
We need something to get rid of these shadows.
We must dispel the shadows if we are to survive.
We've got to dispel these shadows... somehow.

EditorData.NodeContext: Affected by the shadow curse, which is draining their strength

Text.Value: The curse is feeding on me - Shar's withdrawn her protection.
I can't - I can't take this darkness. I need some light.
The darkness is in me. Clotting my blood, dissolving my bones. We need light.
These shadows will be the death of me. We need light...
The air reeks of death. Not sure how long I can hold out. We need light...
I swear, these shadows are eating my soul. We need light...
The longer I stay here, the more the shadows will take from me. We need light...
This darkness is suffocating. I - I can barely catch my breath. We need light...
You're all too right... I can feel it clawing at me.
I need light... the darkness is consuming me...
Please - I need light, or the darkness will take me...
Please - the dark has nearly drained me. We need light.
I think I'm 'most'.
I cannot survive long without a light source.
Please, we've got to get to light...

EditorData.NodeContext: Affected by the shadow curse, which is draining their strength

Text.Value: Alas, not all of us are so lucky.
It's my spirit draining... only light drives the shadows away...
How grand for you. They're draining me dry - I can barely catch a breath.
I can't say the same. My self, my spirit, is being leeched out of me.
Luck you.
I feel the curse... it's draining me...
I feel it, though. My very being, draining out of me.

EditorData.NodeContext: Affected by the shadow curse, which is draining their strength

Text.Value: The shadows are draining me - I can't just walk through them like before.
Most would be unwise to linger in these shadows.

Synopsis: Players are affected by the shadow curse. They start to lose health, and can feel the darkness starting to suck their life away - and 2 party members are available to AD about this.
